channel.title: Special ANIMATION

item.title: Special ANIMATION
item.dc:creator: @fuery0w fuery0w
item.description:
@fuery0w wrote:

How do I add the animation for special?
And how do I make the weapon have a special on it?

I added the special bar but I need to know how to use it so when someone clicks it it does it animation and gets used and hits higher.
I’ve tried Clawzfury’s tut but it didn’t work for me! ;

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=452844.0

Read full topic
